Name: Girlfight 2024
About the game: GirlFight 2024 is the girl fighting game with physical effects that make realistic boobs movements and clothing destruction systems. Let's fight the challenger with your partner and beat them 'till they fall to their knees! This is a early access version of GirlFight 2024. GirlFight 2024 Game Features : ● Classic Fighting System Inspired by classical fighting games such as Mortal Combat and Street Fighter. Easy to learn and play! ● Gorgeous Combo & Skill System Beginners are easy to learn. Of course, the important thing is the shaking of your girls giant boobs when they appear! ● The Sexiest Girl Fighting Game on Steam Our focus is on the fully realistic physics based character + dynamic hair + chest bounce + clothes breaking! ● Awesome Physical Effect For Boobs Mode The new dynamics for the realistic breast swaying physical effect. Even if your character is wearing clothes, it will affect the shape of the moving more authentic. ● The Perfect Clothes Breaking System It may be the most perfect breaking system among the fighting games, and all the clothes can be ripped off! ● Various game modes! Currently, story mode, arcade mode and local and CPU battle mode have been implemented. ● More Clothes and Girl Characters! More clothes and additional character designs are planned.
